validation_notes: Chunk labeled as '4 broken, 32 ambiguous' - analysis confirms mostly ambiguous suggestions
Confidence scores 80-96% indicate suggestions rather than definite broken links
Only 2 actual broken links found and fixed: S-Mount Transition references
Most suggested links do not exist in source files - not applicable
Many suggestions would change meaning or lose specificity (e.g., S-Mount → Mount)
Some suggestions confuse different technical concepts (Distance Control ≠ D'Arce Control)
Files already use correct terminology for their context
High skip rate (94%) expected for ambiguous suggestion chunk
agent_efficiency: 100% for actual broken links, 94% skipped as ambiguous
recommendations: Agent chunks with high ambiguous counts should be marked for manual review
Confidence threshold of 95%+ should be used for automated fixes
Ambiguous suggestions (80-95%) should be reviewed by human editor
Link optimizer should distinguish between broken links and style suggestions
